divs: Sighting DetailsTook dog for a walk and looked up and observed a large bright white lighted object. It then emitted a large circular orange aura. then exploded and the orange aura disappeared or dispersed.
Summary: Large bright light surrounded with an orange aura
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Cassville
